examples: そういう言い方は{誤解}{ごかい}{招}{まね}きます
Don't misunderstand me [what I say]. Don't take what I say the wrong way.｟話｠Don't get me wrong.
誤解を{招}{まね}く{説明}{せつめい}をする
give 〘him〙 a misleading explanation｟of｠.
私たちの間には何か{誤解}{ごかい}があるようです
There seems to be some misunderstanding between us.
道を迷った
We've lost our way.
生きている{限り}{かぎり}ご{親切}{しんせつ}を忘れません
I will not forget your kindness, as long as I live.

結局.english: As a result, after all, in the end
examples: 何度もやってみたが{結局}{けっきょく}だめだった。
I tried many times, but failed after all [but failed in the end, only to fail, ╳but failed at last]
古いコートを{捨}{す}てる
throw away an old coat / get rid of [discard] an old coat.
力を試す
try [test] one's strength.
この新しいローションを試してみます
I'll try this new lotion. I'll give this new lotion a try.
のっそりと起こす。
To get up sluggishly.
{道路}{どうろ}を交差点で渡る
To cross the street at the intersection.
休みの時間に隣の喫茶店に行くことをどう思う？
How would you like to go to the nearby coffee shop on break?
みんな、私たちは心中するって思っているみたい
It seems like everyone though we were going to commit suicide.
私は世界旅行ができることを望む
I wish I could [╳can] travel around the world.
自然な{文章}{ぶんしょう}にするためなら大きく文章を変えても{構}{かま}いません。
You can change the sentences completely to make them sound more natural.

逆らう.english: go against, resist, disobey, defy, oppose
examples: 先生の忠告を逆らう
To resist Sensei's advice.
法に逆らって｟{無視}{むし}して｠{行動}{こうどう}する
act in defiance of the law.
動物を残酷に{扱}{あつか}うな
Don't treat animals cruelly.
彼女と同棲する
Living with her
彼は見かけは{利口}{りこう}そうだが実はそうではない
He looks [appears, is apparently] clever, but in fact he isn't.
人をじろじろみるの失礼です
It's rude to stare at people.
もし同士になったら、帰る直前に会議をしないでください
If you become a boss, please don't hold meetings right before we leave.
やる気を削がれます
To suck motivation
